lines.zh: （东西也太多了。。。下回得跟她说少寄点东西了，根本吃不完啊）
lines.en: (That's way too much stuff... I really need to tell her to send less next time—there's no way I can finish all this.)

lines.zh: （她咋把这个七巧板寄来了，在家里找个地方摆着就好了嘛！）
lines.en: (Why did she send this tangram board? Wouldn’t it have been fine just sitting at home?)

lines.zh: （不过好久没玩了，拼个什么试试吧）
lines.en: (But it *has* been a while… maybe I’ll try piecing something together.)
